value.title: IBM Puts AI On A Chip To Improve Fraud Detection In Real-Time Payments
value.excerpt: IBM has launched a new generation mainframe with artificial intelligence built into the chip to provide financial firms such as banks and credit card companies with the ability to conduct fraud analysis of 100% of their transaction in real-time.

value.title: Lanner Electronics and MOV.AI to speed AMR development with an integrated computing and software platform
